statements: UPDATE UserBehavior SET behavior_type = 'click' WHERE user_id = 1;

UPDATE device_usage SET usage_end = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE usage_id = 1;

UPDATE activity_logs SET activity_type = 'Running', activity_duration = 45, activity_date = '2022-01-20' WHERE log_id = 1;

UPDATE heart_rate_data SET heart_rate = 75, activity_type = 'Running' WHERE user_id = 54321 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-01 23:59:59';
